sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3210 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , ELCT_YYMM , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , TAXM_EARN , TAXM_ETAM , TXET_TXAM , ADDR_BHTX , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #elctYymm# , #systemkey# , #elctDate# , #suprTxam# , #buamTxam# , #inbsAmnt# , #stckInam# , #spbmTxam# , #ecinTxam# , #taxmEcin# , #taxmEarn# , #taxmEtam# , #txetTxam# , #addrBhtx# , #spciHlth# , #spciEmpf# , #natnPsnf# , #earnTaxn# , #ihtxTaxn# , #etccTxam# , #etccEtam# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3210 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , ELCT_DATE=#elctDate# , SUPR_TXAM=#suprTxam# , BUAM_TXAM=#buamTxam# , INBS_AMNT=#inbsAmnt# , STCK_INAM=#stckInam# , SPBM_TXAM=#spbmTxam# , ECIN_TXAM=#ecinTxam# , TAXM_ECIN=#taxmEcin# , TAXM_EARN=#taxmEarn# , TAXM_ETAM=#taxmEtam# , TXET_TXAM=#txetTxam# , ADDR_BHTX=#addrBhtx# , SPCI_HLTH=#spciHlth# , SPCI_EMPF=#spciEmpf# , NATN_PSNF=#natnPsnf# , EARN_TAXN=#earnTaxn# , IHTX_TAXN=#ihtxTaxn# , ETCC_TXAM=#etccTxam# , ETCC_ETAM=#etccEtam# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3210 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YETA3210 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , ELCT_YYMM , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , TAXM_EARN , TAXM_ETAM , TXET_TXAM , ADDR_BHTX , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3210 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , SETT_GBCD AS settGbcdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS settGbcdcommCdNm , ELCT_YYMM , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , TAXM_EARN , TAXM_ETAM , TXET_TXAM , ADDR_BHTX , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3210 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , ELCT_YYMM DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3210 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
